column3: Does this cover ALL files and also .sh or .py scripts? I'd ACK then and suggest merging this just before 0.10 is released and after #5470 is merged!\n

It's too late for 0.10, but agree on merging it at the same time as #5470 as both affect file headers.

Edit: I haven't gone through 261 changed files but if it:
- Changes only license comments
- Covers all files

... have my concept ACK
One file managed to slip through. Now all files are covered.\n
